listen_to(options = {}) {|*(self.script.arify + yield_args)| ...}

[Source]

    # File slices/google_maps/google/event.rb, line 17
17:     def listen_to(options = {})
18:       options.default! :with => []
19:       options.assert_valid_keys :with, :yield_order
20: 
21:       with_arguments = options[:with].arify
22:       js_arguments = with_arguments.join(', ')
23: 
24:       yield_args = if options[:yield_order]
25:                      options[:yield_order]
26:                    else
27:                      with_arguments
28:                    end
29: 
30:       # Wrap the GEvent closure in a method to prevent the non-closure bug of javascript and google maps.
31:       wrap_method = "#{self.on}_#{self.event}(#{self.on})"
32: 
33:       self << "function #{wrap_method}{"
34:       self << "return GEvent.addListener(#{self.on}, \"#{self.event}\", function(#{js_arguments}) {"
35: 
36:       yield *(self.script.arify + yield_args)
37: 
38:       self <<  "});"
39:       self << "}"
40: 
41:       script << "#{self.var} = #{wrap_method};"
42:     end
